go_data.justification: Kir6.2/SUR1 subunits of the K(ATP) channels characterize the fast muscle phenotype with higher K(ATP) currents.
Higher expression and activity of Kir6.2/SUR1 subunits are associated with resistance to atrophy in fast-twitch muscles.
As a subunit of the K(ATP) channel, Kir6.2 is embedded in the plasma membrane of muscle cells.
